markdownRemark.html:
ELK Stack notes

Elasticsearch

Increase production virtual memory sudo sysctl -w vm.max_map_count=262144

Filebeat

Start Filebeat sudo /etc/init.d/filebeat start

Config Filebeat sudo vi /etc/filebeat/filebeat.yml

To see a list of available indexes

curl ‘localhost:9200/_cat/indices?v’
